Sixshot and Ares burst into the ark. Sixshot recognizes the ship and the 
autobots in there maximal forms (i.e. Beachcomber, Bumblebee etc...) or so he 
thinks they are.
He transforms into his gun mode which can float and fly on its own and fires 
at the Maximals with autobot names.
Sixshot: I SHALL DESTROY YOU IN THIS LIFE LIKE I DID IN THE GREAT WAR!!!

Ares transforms into his 3rd mode. I an artillery cannon with 15 visible 
guns. He turns and fires at the Arks control panels and CR chambers.
Ares: NOW I GET A CHANCE TO FIGHT!!!!
